name: Petz Catz 2
description:
Say hello to a cute collection of cuddly and adorable kittens! Pick a furry friend and together you and your new kitten will encounter a world that's fun to play in, explore, and share in Petz Catz 2.

Play dress up, get frisky with new toys, or look for hidden surprises that can give your kitten new abilities. Learn what your kitten is thinking with new kitty thought bubbles! Customize your kitten's environment with items and toys, and unlock more goodies as you get better at caring for your cuddly companion.

Watch your kitten grow, go on quests and adventures together, and unlock awesome mini-games.
